name: 布赖恩·巴赫曼
name_full: 布赖恩·巴赫曼 Bryan Bachman
introduction: Bryan Bachman is an American stage, film and television actor known for his captivating tortured presence on the screen and stage. His career includes projects in film, television, and in touring national stage performances. Born in Huntington Beach, CA, Bryan moved around the country for the majority of his life. Serving eight years in the US Army, as a paratrooper in the 82nd Airborne Division, Bryan reached the rank of Staff Sergeant and deployed to both Afghanistan and Iraq, fighting as an airborne infantryman. After leaving the service for the betterment of his family. Bryan lives in Orlando, FL with his wife and two children.
